H0.text: Evolution is the sum of all chemical reactions that take place within an organism.

H1.text: Metabolism is the sum of all chemical reactions that take place within an organism.

H2.text: Circulation is the sum of all chemical reactions that take place within an organism.

H3.text: Reproduction is the sum of all chemical reactions that take place within an organism.

A4.text: Metabolism refers to the set of life-sustaining chemical reactions that occur within living organisms.

A5.text: The basal metabolic rate of an organism is the measure of the amount of energy consumed by all of these chemical reactions.
